casebody.data:
Richard ALTMAN, Respondent,
v.
285 WEST FOURTH LLC, Appellant. 2018-219 Court of Appeals of New York. February 15, 2018

Motion by Rent Stabilization Association of New York City, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief amici curiae on the appeal herein granted and the proposed brief is accepted as filed. Two copies of the brief must be served, an original and nine copies filed, and the brief submitted in digital format within seven days.
